root.name: Dark Horizon
root.description: OverviewDark Horizon is a space combat simulator which shares characteristics with games such as the original X-Wing VS TIE Fighter and Darklight Conflict. In its 22 levels the game features RPG elements geared toward ship customization as well as the ability to craft original weapons and equipment. Finally and most importantly the game features full joystick support.
